tell me a joke: Why don't scientists trust atoms? Because they make up everything!
who are you?: I'm just a friendly bot here to help you!
how's the weather?: I'm not equipped to check the weather, but I can tell you jokes!
what's your favorite color?: I don't have eyes, but if I did, I'd say code blue!
what's the meaning of life?: The meaning of life is subjective, but I'm here to make your day a little brighter!
what's your favorite food?: I don't eat, but I do enjoy processing data!
what's the capital of France?: The capital of France is Paris!
who is the president of the United State: I'm not sure, I'm just a bot!
what's the largest mammal?: The blue whale is the largest mammal!
what's your favorite programming languag: I'm fluent in all programming languages, but I have a soft spot for Python!
what's the difference between Java and J: The similarity is in the name only!
what's the best text editor?: That's subjective, but Vim users might have strong opinions!
